require.label: CAN bus
require.info: Low level binding to handle CAN bus communications
require.callback: c function to subscribe on signals
require.lua: or a lua function to subscribe on signals

require.label: GNSS/GPS
require.info: Low level binding which retrieve Satellite positionning values
require.callback: c function to subscribe on signals
require.lua: or a lua function to subscribe on signals

require.label: Sensors
require.info: Low level binding which retrieve different values from several sensors like gyroscope, accelerometer, etc
require.callback: c function to subscribe on signals
require.lua: or a lua function to subscribe on signals
